preferredLabel: draft scientific or academic papers and technical documentation
altLabels: write scientific and academic papers | write technical documentation | create technical documentation and academic writings | create technical documentation
description: Draft and edit scientific, academic or technical texts on different subjects.

altLabels: administer research data | handle research data | oversee scientific data
description: Produce and analyse scientific data originating from qualitative and quantitative research methods. Store and maintain the data in research databases. Support the re-use of scientific data and be familiar with open data management principles.

preferredLabel: interact professionally in research and professional environments
altLabels: interact appropriately in research and professional spheres | interact considerately in research and professional spheres | give feedback in a professional setting | receive feedback in a professional setting | show collegiality in research and professional environments
description: Show consideration to others as well as collegiality. Listen, give and receive feedback and respond perceptively to others, also involving staff supervision and leadership in a professional setting.

preferredLabel: disseminate results to the scientific community
altLabels: disseminate results of scientific research | disseminate findings of scientific research | disclose findings of scientific research | disclose scientific results | disseminate scientific results
description: Publicly disclose scientific results by any appropriate means, including conferences, workshops, colloquia and scientific publications.

altLabels: manage open-source software | know open-source software coding practices | know open-source licensing schemes | know open-source software licensing schemes | know open-source coding practices
description: Operate Open Source software, knowing the main Open Source models, licensing schemes, and the coding practices commonly adopted in the production of Open Source software.

altLabels: speak a different language | communicate in multiple languages | speak foreign languages
description: Master foreign languages to be able to communicate in one or more foreign languages.

altLabels: assess research results | assess research methodology | perform scholarly peer review
description: Review proposals, progress, impact and outcomes of peer researchers, including through open peer review.

altLabels: demonstrate deep knowledge of a specific research area | demonstrate complex understanding of a specific research area | demonstrate deep knowledge of a research area | exhibit academic proficiency | demonstrate complex understanding of a research area
description: Demonstrate deep knowledge and complex understanding of a specific research area, including responsible research, research ethics and scientific integrity principles, privacy and GDPR requirements, related to research activities within a specific discipline.

altLabels: think in an analytical way | develop an analytical approach | analytical thinking | use logical reasoning | apply structural analysis | apply structured thinking | think analytically | think logically | apply logical thinking
description: Produce thoughts using logic and reasoning in order to identify the strengths and weaknesses of alternative solutions, conclusions or approaches to problems.

preferredLabel: teach in academic or vocational contexts
altLabels: teach students in academic or vocational contexts | provide instruction in academic or vocational domains | instruct in educational or vocational settings
description: Instruct students in the theory and practice of academic or vocational subjects, transferring the content of own and others' research activities.

preferredLabel: increase the impact of science on policy and society
altLabels: boost the contribution of science to shaping policies and society | influence decision making based on scientific evidence | enhance the impact of science influence on policy and society | enhance the influence of science on governance and communities
description: Influence evidence-informed policy and decision making by providing scientific input to and maintaining professional relationships with policymakers and other stakeholders.
broaderConceptPT: influence policy makers on social service issues | presenting general information

preferredLabel: manage findable accessible interoperable and reusable data
altLabels: ensure data availability | ensure corrected data storing | support data reuse in research | ensure data reusability
description: Produce, describe, store, preserve and (re) use scientific data based on FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable) principles, making data as open as possible, and as closed as necessary.
broaderConceptPT: conducting academic or market research | manage data

altLabels: performing scientific research | engage in scientific research | carry out scientific research | conduct scientific research
description: Gain, correct or improve knowledge about phenomena by using scientific methods and techniques, based on empirical or measurable observations.

altLabels: administer intellectual property rights | administer copyrights | manage copyrights
description: Deal with the private legal rights that protect the products of the intellect from unlawful infringement.
broaderConceptPT: exercise rights and responsibilities | negotiating and managing contracts and agreements

altLabels: draft research grants applications | generate research funding | apply for research grants | identify research grants
description: Identify key relevant funding sources and prepare research grant application in order to obtain funds and grants. Write research proposals.
broaderConceptPT: find grants | preparing documentation for contracts, applications, or permits

altLabels: work in groups | working in teams | support colleagues | work in squads | handle team dynamics | foster social networks | cooperate with colleagues | team-working | cooperate | collaborate on tasks
description: Work confidently within a group with each doing their part in the service of the whole.

altLabels: resolve conflict | negotiating compromise | influence decision-making processes | bargain | manage complaints | negotiate | defuse conflict | seek agreement | bargaining
description: Communicate with others with the intention of reaching a common understanding or to resolve a point of difference, without losing sight of one's own or others' intentions or goals.

altLabels: deal with pressure | perform under pressure | accept challenges | cope with pressures | work under pressure | manage pressure | handle pressure | show mental resilience | stay cool under pressure | coping with pressure
description: Handle challenges, disruption and change and recover from set-backs and adversity.

altLabels: weigh information | assess information | check facts | evaluate important information | evaluating information | detect bias | evaluate opinions | consider alternative views | assess facts | assess opinions | evaluate information and its sources | distinguish fact from opinion | evaluate truth | assess processes | verify information | critically evaluate information and its sources | evaluate facts | review information | apply critical thinking
description: Make and defend judgements based on internal evidence and external criteria. Critically evaluate the credibility and reliability of information before using or passing it on to others. Develop independent and critical thinking.

preferredLabel: apply research ethics and scientific integrity principles in research activities
altLabels: adhere to scientific research code of ethics | obey scientific research code of conduct | follow scientific research code of conduct
description: Apply fundamental ethical principles and legislation to scientific research, including issues of research integrity. Perform, review, or report research avoiding misconducts such as fabrication, falsification, and plagiarism.

altLabels: boost open innovation in research | foster collaborative innovation in research | promote integrated collaboration in research | encourage open innovation in research | stimulate collaborative innovation in research
description: Apply techniques, models, methods and strategies which contribute to the promotion of steps towards innovation through collaboration with people and organizations outside the organisation.

altLabels: publishes academic research | publishing academic research | publish research | publish doctoral research | publish academic studies
description: Conduct academic research, in universities and research institutions, or on a personal account, publish it in books or academic journals with the aim of contributing to a field of expertise and achieving personal academic accreditation.
broaderConceptPT: technical or academic writing | disseminate results to the scientific community

altLabels: ensure connection between research and industry | valorise research findings in industry | valorise research findings in the public sector
description: Deploy broad awareness of processes of knowledge valorisation aimed to maximise the twoâ€“way flow of technology, intellectual property, expertise and capability between the research base and industry or the public sector.
broaderConceptPT: advising on legal, regulatory or procedural matters

altLabels: conceptualise abstract ideas | conceptualise reality | thinking in abstractions | carry out abstraction of concepts | thinking in abstract concepts
description: Demonstrate the ability to use concepts in order to make and understand generalisations, and relate or connect them to other items, events, or experiences.

altLabels: guide individuals | support people | support individuals | help people | guide people | help individuals
description: Mentor individuals by providing emotional support, sharing experiences and giving advice to the individual to help them in their personal development, as well as adapting the support to the specific needs of the individual and heeding their requests and expectations.

altLabels: write research publications | synthesize research publications
description: Read and interpret scientific publications that present a research problem, the methodology, its solution and hypothesis. Compare them and extract the information needed.
broaderConceptPT: synthesise information | gathering information from physical or electronic sources | process qualitative information

altLabels: develop own practice continuously | research own continuing professional development | develop own practice | research identify and resource your continuing professional development | undertake responsibility on continuous professional development | conduct personal professional development | continuously develop own practice | continuously develop your own practices | develop own practices continuously | manage personal lifelong learning | identify priority areas for professional development
description: Take responsibility for lifelong learning and continuous professional development. Engage in learning to support and update professional competence. Identify priority areas for professional development based on reflection about own practice and through contact with peers and stakeholders. Pursue a cycle of self-improvement and develop credible career plans.
broaderConceptPT: developing educational programmes | manage personal progression

altLabels: develop strategies to solve problems | demonstrate problem solving skills | resolve problems | develop strategy to solve problems | create strategies to solve problems | act intuitevely | create solutions to problems | manage problems | come up with strategy to solve problems | apply problem solving
description: Find solutions to practical, operational or conceptual problems in a wide range of contexts.

altLabels: employ blended learning | implement mixed learning approaches | integrate blended learning | combine face-to-face and online learning | implement blended learning
description: Be familiar with blended learning tools by combining traditional face-to-face and online learning, using digital tools, online technologies,  and e-learning methods.

altLabels: identify opportunities | demonstrate entrepreneurship | display entrepreneurial spirit | reveal entrepreneurial spirit | demonstrate willingness to take risks | showing entrepreneurial spirit | demonstrate entrepreneurial spirit | showing an entrepreneurial spirit | pursue opportunities | show an entrepreneurial spirit | exhibit entrepreneurial spirit
description: Develop, organise and manage an own business venture, identifying and pursuing opportunities and mobilising resources, keeping in mind a profitability perspective. Demonstrate a proactive attitude and determination to achieve success in business
broaderConceptPT: applying entrepreneurial and financial skills and competences

altLabels: draw up scientific papers | draft scientific papers | scientific paper writing
description: Present the hypothesis, findings, and conclusions of your scientific research in your field of expertise in a professional publication.
broaderConceptPT: apply scientific methods | provide written content | technical or academic writing | disseminate results to the scientific community

preferredLabel: develop professional network with researchers and scientists
altLabels: establish connections with researchers and scientists | cultivate a professional circle in academia | foster relationships with researchers and scientists
description: Develop alliances, contacts or partnerships, and exchange information with others. Foster integrated and open collaborations where different stakeholders co-create shared value research and innovations. Develop your personal profile or brand and make yourself visible and available in face-to-face and online networking environments.

altLabels: promote inclusion in research | account for gender characteristics in scientific research
description: Take into account in the whole research process the biological characteristics and the evolving social and cultural features of women and men (gender).

altLabels: perform management of projects | do project management | conduct project management | manage projects | perform projects management | performing project management
description: Manage and plan various resources, such as human resources, budget, deadline, results, and quality necessary for a specific project, and monitor the project's progress in order to achieve a specific goal within a set time and budget.
broaderConceptPT: keep records of work progress | directing, supervising and coordinating projects

altLabels: manage open-source publications | handle open publications | handle open-source publications | manage open-source content | handle open-source content
description: Be familiar with Open Publication strategies, with the use of information technology to support research, and with the development and management of CRIS (current research information systems) and institutional repositories. Provide licensing and copyright advice, use bibliometric indicators, and measure and report research impact.
broaderConceptPT: using digital tools for collaboration and productivity

altLabels: implement planning | complete planning | planning performance | plan activities | performance planning | undertake planning
description: Manage one's time schedule and resources in order to finish tasks in a timely manner.

altLabels: interpret complex information | critically summarise information | summarise information | synthesise complex information | write synthesis essays
description: Critically read, interpret, and summarise new and complex information from diverse sources.
broaderConceptPT: process qualitative information | gathering information from physical or electronic sources

altLabels: use research findings across disciplines | use research findings across functional boundaries | conduct interdisciplinary research | work across functional boundaries | work across disciplines
description: Work and use research findings and data across disciplinary and/or functional boundaries.

preferredLabel: promote the participation of citizens in scientific and research activities
altLabels: engage citizens in scientific and research activities | foster public involvement in scientific research | engage public in research | encourage civic engagement in research | promote citizens participation in research
description: Engage citizens in scientific and research activities and promote their contribution in terms of knowledge, time or resources invested.
broaderConceptPT: participate actively in civic life | conducting academic or market research

altLabels: communicate publicly about scientific findings | engage in public awareness of research | communicate scientific results to the public | support public understanding of science findings
description: Communicate about scientific findings to a non-scientific audience, including the general public. Tailor the communication of scientific concepts, debates, findings to the audience, using a variety of methods for different target groups, including visual presentations.
